name: Elise
description: Princess of Nohr who adores her siblings. A bit childish, but has a pure heart and keen eyes. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.
insights: Elise has the lowest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible in Fire Emblem Heroes.
Elise has the lowest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Cavalry heroes.
Elise has the lowest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Cavalry heroes.
Elise has the lowest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Staff heroes.
Elise has the lowest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Staff heroes.
Elise has the lowest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Colorless heroes.

dialogue.text: Hi, I'm Elise—a princess from the Kingdom of Nohr! I bet we're going to be the best of friends!
I like that Sharena—maybe because neither of us act like princesses. Oh! I hope she wouldn't be offended!
My retainers are Effie and Arthur, two of the nicest retainers a girl could ever have. I'm so proud of them!
I'm impressed by how well you keep an eye on things here, <Player Name>! I'll help you with my staff if you ever get worn out!
Let's sneak off sometime to explore the town! I used to do that all the time back home—but don't tell my brothers!
This realm has so many beautiful flowers! I'm going to pick all of them and pass them out to everybody!
I've come on an important errand from <Friend Name>. I'm here to deliver the happiest of hellos. So, here I am!
Step back, world! This girl is on fire!
Yay! I'm such a good fighter now!
All that hard work for this?! Boo.
Yay! Now I'll sparkle even more!

Yay! I always love it when you come chat with me, <Player Name>! I know how busy you are. Wait... Are you hurt? Even a little? Then I'll heal you up real fast! Whew! There. I can't stand to see you hurt. It's like I'm hurt too. And you know why? Sure you do. Because I love you bunches and bunches—more than anyone from any other world! You were the first friend I made here. And you know what? That kind of friendship lasts forever!
